scripts.dev:local: cross-env DEPLOY_ENV=local RUN_ON_CLOUD=false VITE_RUN_ON_CLOUD=false npm run dev:all
scripts.dev:cloud: cross-env DEPLOY_ENV=cloud RUN_ON_CLOUD=true VITE_RUN_ON_CLOUD=true npm run dev:all
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:orchestrator" "npm run dev:runner"
scripts.build:web:local: cross-env VITE_RUN_ON_CLOUD=false npm --prefix apps/web run build:local
scripts.build:web:cloud: cross-env VITE_RUN_ON_CLOUD=true npm --prefix apps/web run build:cloud
scripts.build:local: npm --prefix apps/web ci && npm --prefix apps/web run build:local
scripts.build:cloud: npm --prefix apps/web ci && npm --prefix apps/web run build:cloud
scripts.install:all: npm --prefix apps/web install && npm --prefix apps/server install && npm --prefix apps/orchestrator install && npm --prefix apps/runner install
